about.details:
CMS Info Systems Limited is India's largest cash management company in terms of the number of ATM points and retail pick-up points as of March 31, 2021. The company is engaged in installing, maintaining, and managing assets and technology solutions on an end-to-end outsourced basis for banks, financial institutions, organized retail and e-commerce companies in India.

The business operates in 3 segments; 1. cash management services, 2. managed services i.e. banking automation product sales, common control systems, and software solutions, etc., and 3. others i.e. financial cards issuance for banks and card personalization services. As of August 31, 2021, it has a network of 3,965 cash vans and 238 branches and offices to cover all of India's states and union territories.

Competitive strengths

  • Leading market player with strong fundamentals.
  • Strong Pan-India network of 3,965 cash vans and 238 branches and offices.
  • Longstanding customer relationships with increased business opportunities.
  • Integrated business platform offering a range of products and services.
  • Experienced and highly qualified management team.

faqs.question: What is the CMS Info Systems IPO?
faqs.answer:
CMS Info Systems IPO is a main-board IPO of equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹1,100.00 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹216 per share. The minimum order quantity is 69.

The IPO opens on December 21, 2021, and closes on December 23, 2021.

Link Intime India Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE, NSE.

faqs.question: How to apply in CMS Info Systems IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in CMS Info Systems IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in CMS Info Systems IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in CMS Info Systems IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'CMS Info Systems IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When CMS Info Systems IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The CMS Info Systems IPO opens on December 21, 2021 and closes on December 23, 2021.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of CMS Info Systems IPO?
faqs.answer: CMS Info Systems IPO lot size is 69, and the minimum amount required is ₹14,904.

faqs.question: How to apply for CMS Info Systems IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in CMS Info Systems IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is CMS Info Systems IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for CMS Info Systems IPO will be done on Tuesday, December 28, 2021, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Thursday, December 30, 2021. Check the CMS Info Systems IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is CMS Info Systems IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The CMS Info Systems IPO listing date is on Friday, December 31, 2021.

subscriptionStatus.summary: The CMS Info Systems IPO is subscribed 1.95 times on December 23 2021 5:00:00 PM (Day 3). The public issue subscribed 2.15 times in the retail category 1.98 times in the QIB category and 1.45 times in the NII category. Check Day by Day Subscription Details (Live Status)
